name: Diabolus in Musica
description:
"There is a glamour in belonging, or at least appearing to belong. I suppose that is what drew me towards the friends I made that summer, and towards the most eventful night of my life."

In an attempt to make the most of their last summer together, a group of clever, eccentric misfits break into their music school to perform one last concert.  Following along with them as their sole audience member, you'll foster friendships, reveal a generational curse or even meet the devil himself. 

                                                               *      

Content Warnings:

  • False Imprisonment
  • Death 

                                                               * 

Diabolus in Musica is a visual novel created in a month for Spooktober 2nd Annual Visual Novel Jam.
